amendment.description: Amendment requires that public housing authorities and their contractors and subcontractors hire public housing residents to the maximum extent that is possible.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 31 as printed in the Congressional Record to strengthen bill requirements under which public housing authorities and contractors working within housing projects must try to employ public housing residents.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
